## Interval.overlaps() method

Returns true if this interval intersects `i` in any way (incl. subset / superset).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
overlaps(i: Readonly<Interval>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  i | <code>Readonly&lt;Interval&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
